name: ROCKET PUNCH ULTRA X-TREME
description:
Don't you want to punch this guy in the face?

What are you waiting for?

Punch his stupid friends too.

Controls:
Mouse - Aim
Left-Click - Punch

Credits:
Brandon Baldwin - Environment/Prop Art, Level Design, Lighting
Brandon Gonzales - Programming, Sound Design, Technical Art
Jonathan Morrison - Character Art, Animations

This is a submission to Weekly Game Jam 165. 
The theme is "One Button Mash."

All assets were created during the jam with the exception of a few background textures downloaded from textures.com and modified.
